description: Configuration for parameter sensitivity analysis sweeps (PatternFieldConfig zones)

shapeZone1End.description: SHAPE value where stable zone ends (default 0.28, must be < crossfade1End=0.32)

shapeCrossfade1End.description: SHAPE value where stable->syncopation crossfade ends (default 0.32, must be < zone2aEnd=0.48)

shapeZone2aEnd.description: SHAPE value where lower syncopation zone ends (default 0.48, must be < crossfade2End=0.52)

shapeCrossfade2End.description: SHAPE value where mid syncopation crossfade ends (default 0.52, must be < zone2bEnd=0.68)

shapeZone2bEnd.description: SHAPE value where upper syncopation zone ends (default 0.68, must be < crossfade3End=0.72)

shapeCrossfade3End.description: SHAPE value where syncopation->wild crossfade ends (default 0.72, must be <= 1.0)

controlSweep.description: Control parameter values to test at during each sweep
